error.message: Call to deprecated function file_default_scheme(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::config('system.file')->get('default_scheme') instead.
Call to deprecated function file_prepare_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::prepareDirectory().
Call to deprecated function file_default_scheme(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::config('system.file')->get('default_scheme') instead.
Declaration of Drupal\skyword\Plugin\rest\resource\SkywordPostRestResource::get($postId) should be compatible with Drupal\skyword\Plugin\rest\resource\SkywordPostsRestResource::get()

Call to deprecated method applyUpdates() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityDefinitionUpdateManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityDefinitionUpdateManagerInterface::getChangeList() and execute each entity type and field storage update manually instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to skyword.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
